text: Ville Nieminen (born 6 April 1977 in Tampere, Finland) is a former Finnish professional ice hockey player that currently played for Tappara of the SM- liiga. Nieminen has also played in the NHL for the Colorado Avalanche, Pittsburgh Penguins, Chicago Blackhawks, Calgary Flames, New York Rangers, San Jose Sharks and St. Louis Blues. He won the Stanley Cup with the Avalanche in the 2000â€“01 NHL season. Nieminen also won a silver medal with the Finland men's national ice hockey team in the 2006 Winter Olympics. ==Other websites== * Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:2002 Winter Olympics Category:Calgary Flames players Category:Chicago Blackhawks players Category:Colorado Avalanche players Category:Finnish ice hockey left wingers Category:Olympic silver medalists for Finland Category:Hershey Bears players Category:Medalists at the 2006 Winter Olympics Category:New York Rangers players Category:Pittsburgh Penguins players Category:San Jose Sharks players Category:St. Louis Blues players Category:Stanley Cup champions Category:Swedish Hockey League players Category:Ice hockey people from Tampere
title: Ville Nieminen
